channel.title: Comments on: Are we back in the 1980′s ?

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: On the positive side, it means more investors with more money to dish out to technology companies...
item.content:encoded: On the positive side, it means more investors with more money to dish out to technology companies…

item.title: By: conor
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description:
Do unions still exist outside of the Public Sector?
I thought they went the way of Stalinism and British Leyland.
item.content:encoded:
Do unions still exist outside of the Public Sector?

I thought they went the way of Stalinism and British Leyland.
